title: FS: T206 Bliss Ghost Image (with Freeman) - SOLD!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Bliss Ghost Image (with Freeman) - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Looking for $500 for this card (Piedmont 350 back); if I can't sell it in the next week, it will probably end up at Goodwin.

(BTW: Thanks to Chris for helping to ID Freeman in this card.  Slabbed yesterday at the Philly show.)
Nice Erick, these are much rarer then the two namers. Very tempting :)

[quote name="atx840" post=1097343]Nice Erick, these are much rarer then the two namers. Very tempting :)[/QUOTE]

Yes, very tempting.;)
